source.name: A real navigation
source.instructions:
We will create a navigation menu for our website.

This website consists of 3 pages:
1. The home page (index.html)
2. The about page (sections/about.html)
3. The contact page (sections/contact.html)

In the Filetree panel on the left, there is a folder called "12-nav", which contains all the files for this challenge.

You need to complete the navigation on the index page so that the links to the about and contact pages work.

The about and contact pages have a piece of code that looks like:

```html
<!-- put here your nav below -->
```

When your `index.html` navigation is working, copy it and paste it into the `contact.html` and `about.html` pages. Now modify the navigation on these pages so that it works as expected. Make sure that all the URLs between the pages and the navigation images are correct.

Attention : You are only allowed to use relative paths !

source.name: Our first link
source.instructions:

Remember that the tag for an anchor is `<a>`
We want the following text for it : `Back to index`

When you're done, press the button below to check your code.

source.name: Create the folders and files
source.instructions:
As you may see on the left we are in the folder `5-addressing` We ask you to create the necessary folders and files inside this folder, so that we will find at the url : `YOUR_BOX_URL/5-addressing/folder1/folder2/index.html` the following html page: ```html My super page !

This is my page

It is located in folder1/folder2

On my codio box

Thanks for visiting!

``` Where `YOUR_BOX_URL` has to be replaced by your actual codio box url. In the screenshot above it was https://artist-chef.codio.io/ so in this case the above html code would be at : https://artist-chef.codio.io/5-addressing/folder1/folder2/index.html (Remember the box url will be different for you !) You can try clicking this [link](/5-addressing/folder1/folder2/index.html) in order to verify. If it works correctly you should land on a page with the html content from above ! Good luck !
